Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Necklace
Description: A very sober but extremely elegant necklace. Reconstructed, it is comprised of a row of disc-shaped beads of ostrich eggshell of a classical size and also bears a neritic shell as a pendant. At each extremity, there is a small disc-shaped bead of blue turquoise faience that completes the ensemble. All the materials appreciated by Nubian cultures are assembled here.
